title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 577.1 - Applicability of this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 577.1 - Applicability of this part

State Regulations

This Part applies to land use and development and
subdivision of land on privately owned lands within wild, scenic and
recreational river areas located in the Adirondack Park. The wild, scenic and
recreational rivers and river areas are set forth in Appendix Q-6 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
577.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
